docstring.long_description:
Inputs
------
default : OrderedPair|Vector
    Optional input that defines the size of the output.
docstring.short_description: Generate a single x-y vector of numeric (floating point) constants.

parameters.name: dc_type
parameters.description: The type of DataContainer to return.

parameters.name: constant
parameters.description: The value of the y axis output.

parameters.name: step
parameters.description: The size of the y and x axes.

returns.description:
OrderedPair if selected
x: the x axis generated with size 'step'
y: the resulting constant with size 'step'
Vector if selected
v: the resulting constant with size 'step'
Scalar if selected
c: the resulting constant
